nodes.text: Korace Vondar was a medical specialist whose achievements and career gained galactic fame sometime before the Cold War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic.

Korace Vondar was first mentioned Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare and LucasArts. The Jedi Knight companion character Doc mentions Vondar in the conversation "Healing a Hutt," though only if the player character is female.
